original_title: Narciso Ibáñez Serrador: historias para recordar
overview: How the Uruguayan-Spanish actor, writer, producer and director Narciso 'Chicho' Ibáñez Serrador changed forever the way of producing programs for Spanish television.
tagline: Your shows are part of everyone's memories
title: Narciso Ibáñez Serrador: historias para recordar
